features.featureTitle: Fix the layout/scrolling of the earthquake results table so the bottom of the table list is not visually cropped and the last row can be fully viewed in all view modes (Table and Split). Address the height interaction between the fixed 600px table scroll container in `frontend/src/components/earthquake/EarthquakeResultsTable.tsx` and the `h-[600px] overflow-hidden` wrapper used in Split view in `frontend/src/pages/EarthquakeDashboard.tsx`.
